response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product holds immense value to us, reflecting years of dedication and innovation, and we believe it will be equally valuable to you.

We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000, which represents a significant discount compared to its market value. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your interest and commitment to excellence, aligning closely with our values and vision.

Please consider this offer carefully. We understand that decisions of such magnitude require thoughtful consideration, and we are here to answer any questions or provide additional information that may help you make an informed decision. Should you choose to proceed, we assure you of a seamless and personalized experience throughout the transaction process.

Looking forward to the possibility of bringing this exceptional product into your hands,

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
